Arcadia.KSCI: KSCI, virtual and UHF digital channel 18, is an independent television station serving Los Angeles, California, United States, that is licensed to Long Beach. The station is owned by NRJ TV LLC. KSCI's studios are located on South Bundy Drive in West Los Angeles, and its transmitter is located atop Mount Harvard. The station's signal is relayed on two low-power translator stations: KUAN-LD (channel 38) in Poway (which is part of the San Diego market) and KSKJ-CD (channel 45) in Van Nuys.
